import React from 'react' function Hero (props) { const {dateFrom, dateTo, country, price, rooms} = props const countryText = country ? `en ${country}` : '' const priceText = price ? `por ${price}`: '' const roomsText = rooms ? `de hasta $${rooms} habitaciones`: '' return (

Hoteles

desde el {dateFrom} hasta el {dateTo} {countryText} {priceText} {roomsText}

) } export default Hero
